title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 343.4 - Answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 343.4 - Answer

State Regulations

The operator of a facility or the applicant for an
operating certificate may file an answer to the allegations contained in a
notice of hearing. The answer must be in writing and must be filed with the
department not less than five business days prior to the date of
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
343.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
